Title: Laura Karlson to Alma C. Wilson Card 1949.12.12
Description: CHRISTMAS CARD FROM LAURA KARLSON, POST STAMPED ON DECEMBER 12 – 1949, TO MRS. ALMA WILSON, 102 WEST 5TE STREET, DELL RAPIDS, SYD DAKOTA, U.S.A.  THE ENVELOPE HAS TWO MOSS GREEN 15 ØRE STAMPS WITH LION, A GREEN10 ØRE STAMP WITH LION, AND A PURPLE 5 ØRE STAMP WITH THE NORWEGIAN POSTAL HORN.
Creator: Laura Karlson
Siri Lawson, trans.
